changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_kyc" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "user_id" UUID NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "status" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'PENDING', "level" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'TIER_1', "verified_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "internal_note" TEXT NULL, "risk_score" DECIMAL(5,2) NULL DEFAULT 0.00, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "tb_user"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("user_id") -- 1:1 relationship );
